nodes.text: A clone served as a shock trooper with Coruscant Guard during the Clone Wars between the Republic and the Separatists. He was stationed at the Republic Judiciary Central Detention Center in Galactic City on Coruscant.

Around 21 BBY, when Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi disguised himself as bounty hunter Rako Hardeen and infiltrated the Republic Judiciary Central Detention Center to uncover a plot to assassinate Supreme Chancellor Palpatine, this clone trooper transported the undercover Jedi to speak to Phindian criminal Moralo Eval in his cell.

The clone first appeared in the fifteenth episode of the Star Wars: The Clone Wars television series' fourth season, titled "Deception". He was voiced by Dee Bradley Baker, the actor who portrays all of the clone troopers in the series.
